page.title: 16Spring Farm Vineyard.
page.content: Background:- Spring Farm{Vineyard}is situated in Moorlynch, a small vllage off the A39 between Bridgwater and Street. The farm has 80 acres, 12 of which are used for wine production. It is owned by Mr & Mrs Rees who bought the farm in 1981 with the hope of converting part of it into a vineyard. With a lot of hard work and financial help they succeeded in{harvesting their first{crop}in 1983, producing 9000 bottles of{wine.}In 1984 16000 bottles were made and they hope to increase this output to at least 30000 bottles in future years. The farm comprises of a farmhouse, a renovated wagon_house, now a bar, a large building used for the wine production and various buildings used for hay storage and animal housing. They employ 1 full_time and 4 part_ time workers who all live locally.
